title: Online Collaborative Argumentation and Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge, argumentation skills, and self-regulated learning experience
context.additional_context: Utilizes cloud-based collaborative whiteboards with personal devices; evaluates argumentation structure and self-regulatory processes through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically structure argumentation using TAP/TAP scaffolding.
Learners can effectively apply self-regulation strategies (self/co-regulatory/socially shared regulation) during collaborative processes.
Learners can generate argumentative commentary on scientific topics in an online collaborative environment.
Learners can revise and enhance argumentative reports based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
